title: Twin City Crossroads
description: Jack Pennywise and his fellow time travellers have escaped the clutches of the Saurians and are now in the Dushku city of Thoth. But are they safe? Jack has learned of his destiny, and wants nothing more than to stop it, but the Dushku leaders have other plans-including finding out just how our heroes got to Dinosauria in the first place...
author: J. Rock
